movies.title: The Tomorrow War
movies.description: A family man is drafted to fight in a future war where the fate of humanity relies on his ability to confront the past.
movies.stars: Chris Pratt, Yvonne Strahovski, J.K. Simmons

movies.title: F9
movies.description: Cipher enlists the help of Jakob, Dom's younger brother to take revenge on Dom and his team.
movies.writer: Daniel Casey, Justin Lin, Alfredo Botello
movies.stars: Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster

movies.title: Luca
movies.description: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.
movies.writer: Enrico Casarosa, Jesse Andrews, Simon Stephenson
movies.stars: Jacob Tremblay, Jack Dylan Grazer, Emma Berman

movies.title: Fear Street
movies.description: A circle of teenage friends accidentally encounter the ancient evil responsible for a series of brutal murders that have plagued their town for over 300 years. Welcome to Shadyside.
movies.writer: R.L. Stine, Kyle Killen, Phil Graziadei
movies.stars: Kiana Madeira, Olivia Scott Welch, Benjamin Flores Jr.

movies.title: The Ice Road
movies.description: After a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada, a ‘big-rig’ ice road driver must lead an impossible rescue mission over a frozen ocean to save the trapped miners.
movies.stars: Liam Neeson, Marcus Thomas, Laurence Fishburne

movies.title: A Quiet Place Part II
movies.description: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path.
movies.writer: John Krasinski, Scott Beck, Bryan Woods
movies.stars: Emily Blunt, Millicent Simmonds, Cillian Murphy

movies.title: No Sudden Move
movies.description: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.
movies.stars: Don Cheadle, Benicio Del Toro, David Harbour

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: A film about Natasha Romanoff in her quests between the films Civil War and Infinity War.
movies.writer: Jac Schaffer, Ned Benson, Eric Pearson
movies.stars: Scarlett Johansson, Florence Pugh, David Harbour

movies.title: In the Heights
movies.description: A film version of the Broadway musical in which Usnavi, a sympathetic New York bodega owner, saves every penny every day as he imagines and sings about a better life.
movies.stars: Anthony Ramos, Corey Hawkins, Leslie Grace

movies.title: Cruella
movies.description: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.
movies.writer: Dana Fox, Tony McNamara, Aline Brosh McKenna
movies.stars: Emma Stone, Emma Thompson, Joel Fry
